name: libiter
body:
### Welcome to libiter Pages.
[libiter](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libiter) is a library containing iterative solvers for linear set of equations used in [libstokes](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libstokes).

### about RYUON project
[libiter](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libiter) is a part of [RYUON project](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/).

For details about libiter, go to [libiter](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libiter/)

### Authors and Contributors
Kengo Ichiki (@kichiki)

### License
[libiter](http://kichiki.github.com/ryuon/libiter) is released under [GNU General Public License, version 2](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)
